channel.title: Recoloring Items

item.title: Recoloring Items
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

You’re welcome.

	case 5525://Pink Halloween Mask
	itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[1];
	itemDef.newModelColor = new int[1];

	itemDef.modelRotationY = 516;
	itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
	itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = -10;
	itemDef.anInt165 = 3188;
	itemDef.anInt200 = 3192;
	itemDef.name = "Pink h'ween mask";
	itemDef.description = "Aaaarrrghhh... I'm a monster.";
	break;

item.title: Recoloring Items
item.dc:creator: @tomypast tomypast
item.description:
@tomypast wrote:

Whenever i spawn item 8671 I keep getting a pink skirt called null. I entered this code into itemdef.java
Can anyone tell me what I did wrong

case 8671:

itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[1];
itemDef.newModelColor = new int[1];
itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 926;
itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 11200;
itemDef.modelid = 2438;
itemDef.modelZoom = 730;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 516;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -10;
itemDef.anInt165 = 3188;
itemDef.anInt200 = 3192;
itemDef.name = “Yellow h’ween Mask”;
itemDef.description = “Aaaarrrghhh… I’m a monster.”;
break;

Read full topic
